projects.title: SOS Emergency
projects.description: SOS Emergency is a web-based application that delivers emergency services directly to vehicle owners.

rolesAndRes: Socket connections from the frontend side.
Developing multiple screens of application in React JS.
detail.tools: Visual Studio Code, GIT, BitBucket, Jira, Confluence, Postman, Figma.
detail.tech: React JS, JavaScript, SCSS, Ant Design(antd), Material UI Icons, JEST Testing Library, Node Packages, Socket IO, React Flow, Agile Methodology.

projects.title: SOS Emergency Training Module
projects.description: The SOS Emergency Training Module primarily focuses on providing training to agents involved in the SOS Emergency Project.

rolesAndRes: Design UI pages with the expected format.

projects.title: Chat Space
projects.description: Chat Space - Stay Connected, Anywhere, Anytime: Your Ultimate Chat Companion

detail.firstPara: This is your go-to destination for seamless communication. Whether you're connecting with friends, family, or colleagues, our intuitive platform ensures smooth conversations anytime, anywhere. With robust features, including secure messaging, customizable group chats, and effortless file sharing, staying in touch has never been easier. Join our vibrant community and experience the future of communication today.
rolesAndRes: Database connectivity from the node js backend (CRUD Operations).
Design user interface with the expected format.
Developing multiple screens of the application in React JS.
detail.tools: Visual Studio Code, GIT, MySQL Workbench, Clever Cloud - Console, Render, Netlify
detail.tech: React JS, JavaScript, SCSS, Ant Design(antd), Node Packages- Socket IO, Axios, Emoji-picker-react, Cloudinary
